title: Passive to active voice conversion
objective: To learn conversion of sentence from passive voice to active voice.
learningOutcome1: Student will able to learn about the conversion of sentence from passive voice to active voice.
act1: In this activity, learn about the conversion of sentences from passive voice to active voice.
act2: Observe the structure of the passive voice sentence and convert it into active voice.
act3: Click on "VERIFY" to verify the converted sentence.
act4: Detailed feedback is provided for the converted sentence.
instr1: Select the tense from the dropdown to generate the sentence.
instr2: A sentence is generated in the passive voice.
instr3: Convert the passive voice sentence to active voice.
instr4: Rearranged the words of the active voice sentence to make a correct sentence.
instr6: Click on "VERIFY" to check the active voice sentence.
instr7: Click on "NEXT" to view the next sentence.
instruction_restart: Click on the "RESTART" button to try the level again.
hint1: In active voice, the positions of Subject and Object are interchanged.
hint2: In active voice, Helping Verb (if present) precedes the Main Verb, and depends on Subject and tense.
hint3: Base form is used in Simple Present Tense.
q_instr2: The quiz will start after clicking on the "OK" button, along with a timer.
q_instr3: To select an option as an answer to a given question, click on it.
q_instr4: You will get two attempts to select the correct option to the question.
q_instr5: You may skip the question if you want.
q_instr6: The score and timing are displayed on the top of the screen throughout the quiz.
q_instr7: You will get +1 for each correct answer. There is no negative marking.
q_instr8: The scorecard will be generated at the end of the quiz.
proc2: The sentence displayed is in passive voice.
proc3: Now, rearrange the given words below to construct the corresponding active voice of the given sentence.
proc4: Click on "VERIFY" to check whether the active voice is properly constructed and check the feedback displayed below.
proc6: Click on "NEXT" to view the next sentence.
